sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_instance_clone.SncCloneLoggerUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Clone Logger Utility methods for logging the clone messages.</description>
        <name>SncCloneLoggerUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SncCloneLoggerUtil = Class.create();
SncCloneLoggerUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    type: 'SncCloneLoggerUtil'
};

/*
 * Utility method to log message as info
 */
SncCloneLoggerUtil.info = function(cloneId, logMessage, source) {
	SncCloneLoggerUtil.log(cloneId, logMessage, CloneConstants.logLevel.LOG_LEVEL_INFO, source);
};

/*
 * Utility method to log message as error
 */
SncCloneLoggerUtil.error = function(cloneId, logMessage, source) {
	SncCloneLoggerUtil.log(cloneId, logMessage, CloneConstants.logLevel.LOG_LEVEL_ERROR, source);
};

/*
 * Utility method to log message
 */
SncCloneLoggerUtil.log = function(cloneId, logMessage, logLevel, source) {
	if(gs.nil(cloneId))
		return;

	var logTableGr = new GlideRecord(CloneConstants.tableName.CLONE_LOG);
	if(!logTableGr.isValid())
		return;
	
	logTableGr.initialize();
	logTableGr.setValue('clone_request', cloneId);
	logTableGr.setValue('message', logMessage);
	logTableGr.setValue('level', logLevel);
	logTableGr.setValue('source', source);
	logTableGr.insert();

};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-02-23 06:14:31</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>55228af7070121101fc37a76fed30062</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SncCloneLoggerUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Clone Admin Console" source="sn_instance_clone">31774a2953839110a6f8ddeeff7b12cb</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Clone Admin Console">31774a2953839110a6f8ddeeff7b12cb</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_55228af7070121101fc37a76fed30062</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-02-23 06:17:41</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
